|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Delvice is known also as ''ZyXEL SpeedLink 5501'' :LAN: 2x 1GbE + 2x 100M *[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/zyxel-spharion-5501-vmg8546-d70a-6501-anyone-has-tried-to-launch-openwrt-on-that/23562 ''ZyXEL VMG8546-D70A'' on '''OpenWRT ''' forum]

CPU:   500 MHz
